SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

com.sample.document
Class Document

java.lang.Object
  com.sample.document.Document
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Document
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

This class represents a basic data container for the communication between a Sample Server and its client. Each Document contains a document type and zero or more Field objects. This structure corresponds to a normal logical data record structure that contains multiple data fields.

See Also:
Serialized Form

Field Detail

_debug

public static boolean _debug
a debug logging flag. This may be set to true from the Sample Server initialization methods and controlled by the Sample Server property file. The default value is set to false to prevent the list() methods from writing to System.out when this class is loaded as a client side in the adapter implementation

_documentTypeNames

public static final java.lang.String[] _documentTypeNames
Document type names, make sure it reflects to type index constants in correct sequence.

Constructor Detail

Document

public Document()
Default Constructor. Buy default, it is of subdocument type representing a logical subdocument within a top level document. Only use this method to build a subrecord in a Document

Document

public Document(int documentType)
Constructor for a specified document type. Always use this method instead of the default constructor to build top- level document.

Parameters:
documentType - document type
Method Detail

addField

public void addField(Field field)
Adds a data field to the document.

Parameters:
field - a Field to be added at the end of other existing data fields

getDocumentType

public int getDocumentType()
Retrieves the document type.

Returns:
the document type

getField

public Field getField(int fieldIndex)
Retrieves a field. This method should be used only in a loop to go through all the data fields or to retrieve a data field that is set at a well known index.

Parameters:
fieldIndex - a field index
Returns:
a Field, or null if not available

getField

public Field getField(java.lang.String fieldName)
Retrieves a field.

Parameters:
fieldName - a field name
Returns:
a Field, or null if not available

getFieldLength

public int getFieldLength()
Gets the count of data fields

getFieldValue

public java.lang.Object getFieldValue(int index)
Retrieves a field value. This method should be used only in a loop to go through all the data fields or to retrieve a data field that is set at a well known index.

Parameters:
index - index of the data field
Returns:
the data field value

getFieldValue

public java.lang.Object getFieldValue(java.lang.String fieldName)
Retrieves a field value.

Parameters:
fieldName - a field name
Returns:
the field value, or null if not available

list

public void list()
Lists the contents of the document. This is a debug feature. The contents of the document is written to the System.out
